name: Chesskoban Cyber
description:
On a cybernetic map, move knights and bishops, go through portals, capture enemies and advance.

With the creative mode you can create your own levels and share them with the community.

Play and challenge yourself with community levels.



Controlling the main character you will be able to move your party's knights or bishops to the correct positions, or go through portals. Knights will capture enemy pieces with an "L" shaped move and bishops with diagonal move, based on chess. Once your knights or bishops are positioned correctly they will capture enemies all at once.

The Player which is an original piece created based on the King (is the character that will move the knights ).

For the best experience and Features:
30 original levels with increasing difficulty
Creative mode
Community Levels
Playable with mouse and keyboard and ( Playable with mouse only ).
Isometric and perspective camera modes.
Good soundtrack
